评论概述: Really soft, lightweight, true to size
评论详情: Super happy with this shirt. It fits as expected, is soft and stretchy, and true to size. Fabric is lightweight and breathable and feels like it will wash and dry well without issues.

This top has a non-traditional v-style neckline. I ordered it in green and really like the color. It's pretty long so you may want to at least partially tuck it in. The material is soft and comfortable. I'm 5'6", 164 lbs and a large fits me well other than the length being longer than I'd like.

I absolutely love this shirt. I am not a big fan of some V-Neck shirts, but this one is just perfect. It is soft and so comfortable to just lounge around my house in or stylish enough to go out in a pair of jeans, leggings or shorts. I usually am a medium, but I ordered up to a large to get that bagginess. If you want it to have that oversize feel on you, I would size up. All in all, it is a cute shirt and now I am going to have to go get some more colors.

I got the Fuchsia, with a small lean toward red rather than pink, which I prefer. I like the neckline and the fabric is very comfortable. I got the XL, which fits fine but is not loose, which I usually am in an XL. So sizing is a little on the small side.

This top has an unusual neckline which looked ok on but not as good on me as a traditional v-neck. The fabric is on the thin side. I got the blue and it’s a pretty shade that looks as it does in the product description.
